summary: a total of 18 patients confirmed with the pandemic H1N1 2009 influenza virus from July 18 to July 30, 2009 were enrolled in this study. each patient underwent an evaluation to determine detailed clinical and radiological features. results All patients presented with high fever (> 38.0°C), with accompanying symptoms of cough, rhinorrhea, sore throat, myalgia and diarrhea. all patients
